items.title: Create Multiple (Unlimited) Webview/Tabs Dynamically | Guide
items.summary: Create/Remove/Switch WebviewFollow the below steps to create/Tabs Webviews Dynamically Id- For Assigning a Unique Id for Each webview Url- Url’s for Webview. *You can add textbox to enter Desired Url This Procedure will be used to switch the visibility of Webviews. Webview will br created Dynamically.
items.content_html:
• Create/Remove/Switch Webview

Follow the below steps to create/Tabs Webviews Dynamically

1. Components




2. Blocks

  • Variables

Id- For Assigning a Unique Id for Each webview

Url- Url’s for Webview. *You can add textbox to enter Desired Url

  • Procedure

This Procedure will be used to switch the visibility of Webviews.

  • Create Webview/Tabs

Webview will br created Dynamically. All the blocks should be in same order.

Create webview- Webview is created using a Unique Id.

Visibility (Procedure) - Currently created webview is set to visible.

Set webview - currently created webview is set as active so all the properties,events will be related to current webview.

  • Switch Webview/Tabs

A List Picker will visible with a list all available webview. Selected Webview will be visible.

  • Remove Webview/Tabs

 

 
A List Picker will visible with a list all available webview. Selected Webview will be removed.

If all the webview will be removed then all the values will be reset.

 

Download :

Apk:CreepyApricotLeopard.apk (5.2 MB)
Aia:CreepyApricotLeopard.aia (62.7 KB)

Refrences :

Custom Webview By @vknow360

 
 CustomWebView : An extended form of Web Viewer Extensions

By Using your own logic this can be customised to a better design. This is just a refrence to how to dynamically create webviews.

Thanks Kodular For a great Platform. 

Happy Koding 

Peace ☮️

items.content_html:

So Let’s Begin

1. Search Bar with simple List

• Design

Design The Search Bar According to Your Need Make two Arrangement

In search Arrangement there will be a text box for input. Other things you can manage according to your need OR check my aia.

• Blocks

Textbox to temporarily save input

2. Search Bar with Dynamic List

Design The Search Bar According to Your Need Make two Arrangement

In search Arrangement there will be a text box for input. Other things you can manage according to your need OR check my aia (Screen 2)
For list view design Refer my Guide’s first list view.

• Blocks

List from which user will search

Global Textbox to temporarily save input


Global Id for dynamic listview

items.title: Kodular - No Code App Creator
items.summary: Interested in Making Android App or have a good idea, but don't know to code. Don't worry we got you a new toy !! Kodular - A Modern App Creator, is a Distribution of MIT App Inventor. A Blocky based Android App Development Platform. Developing Applications is…
items.content_html:
Interested in Making Android App or have a good idea, but don't know to code. Don't worry we got you a new toy !!
 

Starting here is so simple, just head to their homepage, click on Create Apps and log in using any desired option. It will take you to Kodular Creator. Where you will turn Ideas to Apps. There click on create new project, a pop-up will appear enter your project name then configure your project setting and click on Finish and Congratulations your Project is Created 🥳

‌I personally recommend and use Kodular for Creating Professional Applications. I am also Available on Kodular Community and had Published Several Basic/Advance Guides for Kodular. You can also ask your Issue/Query there. The Kodular Community is One of the best and Active Community in all AI2 Distros. The Users and Staff there are so helpful and give their best to give you the solution to your problem.

Here are Some Recommendations for Getting Started.
 
  • Kaffine TV
  • Kodular
  • Pixii Bomb

Hope this article helped you to gain some new and Interesting Information, if so then share this to your Family and Friends also.

Have Questions about this article or another, Join our LOGYC Realm on telegram and ask your doubts.

 

Happy Koding

Peace ☮️
